Movie/Show Synopsis: In 1970s Rome, Clara and her trans son Andrew strive to protect each other by using their imaginations to escape family tension.
Movie/Show Sales Pitch: A tender exploration of identity and motherhood, starring Academy Award Winner Penélope Cruz (Vicky Cristina Barcelona, Volver), this moving, thought-provoking film premiered at Venice International Festival.
Festivals: Venice Film Festival, 2023 Sundance Film Festival
Cast: Penélope Cruz, Luana Giuliani, Vincenzo Amato
Writer(s): Emanuele Crialese, Francesca Manieri, Vittorio Moroni
Tag(s): 1970s, family crisis, gender, gender identity, musical, rome, singing, transgender
